children.name: No
children.description: Well, I think you do understand, don't you? ;) Film begins. 8:30am, 9 July 1984.

children.name: Frosties
children.description: Neighborhood dog is alluded to. He will be the death of us, says the dad.

children.name: Sugar Puffs
children.description: Neighborhood dog is alluded to. He will be the death of us, says the dad.

children.name: Rushed game. Revierwer gives it 0 out of 5 starts
Meet Colin and pitch Bandersnatch.
children.description: Now Stefan knows about this pathway. He tells Colin that his game bug is a buffer error.

children.name: Try again!
children.description: Maybe you wanna Refuse?! Freewill, huh ;)

children.name: Nothing is perfect, says game reviewer. Stefan visits therapist.
8:45 tran derailed. Cut to music store.
Game development montage with vinyl soundtrack.
Try again!
children.description: Maybe you wanna Shout at dad? Do what I want ;)

children.name: Free will realization. Colin attempts to prove this.
Tragic accident. Bandersnatch finished abruptly. Not even a rating.
Colin
children.description: This causes Colin to go missing, affecting subsequent pathways.

children.name: Delivery day. An intern gives Stefan a tape from Colin - a documentary about Jerome.
children.description: Depending on Frosties on Sugar Buffs, an ad plays here for either.

children.name: Cracks | Or he goes through it
Destroy computer | Throw tea over computer
children.description: Does not work - Stefan feels somebody is controlling him

children.name: Try to explain | Tell him more
Stop the conversation | Tell Him More [It is like TV but online. I control it.]
Tells Dad, taken to therapist. Therapist says his life, as a  scenario, is not entertaining enough.
Meta, goes to film set. Director stops him and says it is the fight scene now.
Stefan fights her. Dad comes and chokes stefan.
Kick dad in the balls | Karate chop dad
How is that for entertainment you psychiatric fuck?!
Try again!
children.description: Maybe you wanna go with White Bear? I like that more ;)

children.name: Mental breakdown about not being in control
Stefan kills director. Colin is arrested for drug use.
Tuckersoft fails after Banderstantch is not released (Stefan arrested).
Kitty asks where Colin is and comes over to Stefans
Kitty leaves. Dog digs up body
children.description: Remember when the dad said he will be the death of us?

children.name: Tuckersoft fails after Banderstantch is not released (Stefan arrested).

Colin comes to help Stefan. Stefan confesses to killing Dad.
